languages.text: "Команда волнуется, Лорд-капитан: цвета на мостике сгущаются. Но я уверена — когда придет время, они будут готовы".
"The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."
languages.original_text: "Команда волнуется, Лорд-капитан: цвета на мостике сгущаются. Но я уверена — когда придет время, они будут готовы".

traits.locale_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."
"The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."
"The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."
"The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."

languages.text: “所有船员都躁动不安，舰长大人。舰桥上的颜色变得越来越阴沉，但我相信，当时机到来的时候，所有人都会做好准备。”
languages.original_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."

traits.locale_text: “所有船员都躁动不安，舰长大人。舰桥上的颜色变得越来越阴沉，但我相信，当时机到来的时候，所有人都会做好准备。”

languages.text: «La tripulación está agitada, Lord Capitán. Los colores del puente se intensifican, pero la gente estará lista cuando llegue el momento».
languages.original_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación está agitada, Lord Capitán. Los colores del puente se intensifican, pero la gente estará lista cuando llegue el momento».

languages.text: 「クルーが動揺しています、ロード・キャプテン。ブリッジの色は深く、濃くなっています。ですが、時が来れば、覚悟はできるものだと確信しています」
languages.original_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."

traits.locale_text: 「クルーが動揺しています、ロード・キャプテン。ブリッジの色は深く、濃くなっています。ですが、時が来れば、覚悟はできるものだと確信しています」

languages.text: « L'équipage est agité, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Sur la passerelle, les couleurs se font de plus en plus sombres, mais je suis sûre que le moment venu, ils seront prêts. »
languages.original_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage est agité, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Sur la passerelle, les couleurs se font de plus en plus sombres, mais je suis sûre que le moment venu, ils seront prêts. »

languages.text: "Die Crew ist aufgebracht, Lord Captain: Die Farben auf der Brücke werden intensiver. Ich bin jedoch sicher, wenn die Zeit kommt, werden sie bereit sein."
languages.original_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."

traits.locale_text: "Die Crew ist aufgebracht, Lord Captain: Die Farben auf der Brücke werden intensiver. Ich bin jedoch sicher, wenn die Zeit kommt, werden sie bereit sein."

languages.text: "Mürettebat telaşlı Lord Kaptan. Köprüdeki renkler koyulaşıyor. Yine de zamanı geldiğinde hazır olacaklarına eminim."
languages.original_text: "The crew is agitated, Lord Captain: the colours on the bridge are deepening, but I am sure when the time comes, they will be ready."
